TextView.android:text: Riven's E is an abilitiy that gives her a shield based on her AD and the shield at her level. Usually you will want to use your shield to activate one of your combos. Your E makes it so you can animation cancel a lot of your abilities so for most combos you will start with E. If you aren't using a combo the best time to use your E is when you are going to take the most damage, or to gap close in or away from the fight. Usually after your E you will want to hit the enemy with an auto before using your next ability to utilize your passive.
